thread.title: Time-lapse footage shows transformation of Dartford Crossing
thread.title_full: Time-lapse footage shows transformation of Dartford Crossing | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Time-lapse footage shows transformation of Dartford Crossing
text:
As figures released today reveal that the Dart Charge reduces journey time, a new Highways England video shows the Crossing's seven month transformation.
Last updated Tue 13 Oct 2015 Read more 2 updates Dart Charge - almost one year on Travel Motoring Dartford Crossing Essex Kent
